page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE:L.WOLD GIRL
page.content: In the morning I get up at about 8.00, get dressed and go downstairs to have breakfast.I often have shreddies. Then I walk to the taxi at the old school.When we get to school we play until it is time to go in.In the morning before assembly,I often do drawing.After assembly we do maths.We then go out to play.After play we may do S.R.A.or English work book.Then we have lunch at 12.00.I have sandwiches & biscuits.Then it is break time. When we come in,we read;then we some- times do P.E. or projects.At 2.30 we have play time.After play we do more work,and at 3.15 we go home. I usually go riding when I get back.My pony is called Fonty.he is a grey,three quarters Welsh and a quarter Arab.After tea,I watch T.V. until bedtime at about 9.00.
